SELECT * FROM tbl_supplier_information
and supplier_abbreviation like CONCAT('%',#{supplierAbbreviation},'%' )
and supplier_code like CONCAT('%',#{supplierCode},'%')
and mnemonic_code like CONCAT('%',#{mnemonicCode},'%')
and supplier_phone like CONCAT('%',#{supplierPhone},'%')
and main_contact like CONCAT('%',#{mainContact},'%')
